title: PIN should not count as a biometric device for UserConsentVerifier
body: The documentation for UserConsentVerifier says that it:

comments.body: Currently the user has the option to use PIN code and ignore using the more secure method which is biometric login (using fingerprint or face recognition....) that totally remove the advantage of the existing biometric device.
btw: sergey is one of the developers of one of the most popular password apps. So, Mircosoft, Listen up !
Some degree of control in what verification options are desired is definitely welcome in API. And would be nice to include Picture Password into consent verifier as well.
